output.sentences: He took his time stepping across the stops entering the lake.
The water in the city had a lot of modern features about it.
One of the most interesting was the yin yang symbol in the cement.
But my favorite had to be the garden which was so unique in its own.
As we entered the garden we were greeted by an amazing budah statue.
